record.title: UNANIMOUS-CONSENT AGREEMENT--S. 1348

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the cloture vote on the motion to proceed to S. 1348 occur on Monday, May 21, no earlier than 5.30 p.m., and that if cloture is invoked, the motion be agreed to without any intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
